data.title: DCR Dam Safety contacts
meta_keywords: The Virginia Department of Conservation and Recreation
data.meta_description: The Virginia Department of Conservation and Recreation
data.text:
Dam Safety staff contacts

Dam Safety | Simplified Dam Breach Inundation Mapping | SWCD, State Parks Dams | Floodplain Management Contacts

In Case of Emergency

In the event of a dam emergency please call Virginia Department of Emergency Management at (804) 674-2400 and notify your regional engineer.

Dam Safety Regions

Click here or on the above map for a more detailed color map of the regions.

Lead Engineer

Mark W. Killgore, P.E., D.WRE, F.ASCE

Lead Dam Safety Engineer

600 E. Main St., 24th Floor

Richmond, VA 23219

804-625-3977 office

804-371-2630 fax

Mark.Killgore@dcr.virginia.gov

DSIS Technical Support Desk

For assistance registering for DSIS visit the Dam Safety Inventory System page. For additional DSIS inquiries email dsis@dcr.virginia.gov

Dam Safety Grants

For grant information visit the Dam Safety Funding page. For other dam safety grants related inquiries email dam@dcr.virginia.gov

Region 1

Arlington, Clarke, Culpeper, Fairfax, Fauquier, Frederick, Loudoun, Madison, Page, Prince William, Rappahannock, Shenandoah, Stafford, Warren and the cities of Alexandria, Fairfax, Falls Church, Manassas, Manassas Park and Winchester

Andrea Henry, P.E.

Regional Dam Safety Engineer

900 Natural Resources Drive, Room 2028

Fontaine Research Park

Charlottesville, VA 22903

804-584-0033 office

Andrea.Henry@dcr.virginia.gov

Region 2

Caroline, Charles City, Chesterfield, Essex, Gloucester, Goochland, Hanover, Henrico, James City, King and Queen, King George, King William, Lancaster, Mathews, Middlesex, New Kent, Northumberland, Powhatan, Richmond, Spotsylvania, Westmoreland, York and the cities of Fredericksburg, Hampton, Newport News, Poquoson, Richmond and Williamsburg

Brenton Payne, P.E.

Regional Dam Safety Engineer

600 E. Main St., 24th Floor

Richmond, VA 23219

804-786-1359 office

804-371-2630 fax

Brenton.Payne@dcr.virginia.gov

Region 3

Accomack, Amelia, Brunswick, Campbell, Charlotte, Dinwiddie, Greensville, Isle of Wight, Lunenburg, Mecklenburg, Northampton, Nottoway, Prince Edward, Prince George, Southampton, Surry, Sussex, and the cities of Chesapeake, Colonial Heights, Emporia, Franklin, Hopewell, Lynchburg, Norfolk, Petersburg, Portsmouth, Suffolk and Virginia Beach

Scott J. Thomas, P.E.

600 E. Main St., 24th Floor

Richmond, VA 23219

804-229-2610

Scott.Thomas@dcr.virginia.gov

Region 4

Alleghany, Bedford, Bland, Botetourt, Buchanan, Carroll, Craig, Dickinson, Floyd, Franklin, Giles, Grayson, Halifax, Henry, Lee, Montgomery, Patrick, Pittsylvania, Pulaski, Roanoke, Russell, Scott, Smyth, Tazewell, Washington, Wise, Wythe and the cities of Bristol, Covington, Danville, Galax, Martinsville, Norton, Radford, Roanoke and Salem
